sentences.sContent: It is arguable that this was not as grave a handicap as it might appear.
sentences.sCn: 有证据证明，这一残障不像看上去那么严重。

synos.tran: 可论证的；可议的；可疑的

remMethod.val: argu (看作argue ， 辩论) + able (可以…的) → 可辩论的

words.tran: 可论证地；可争辩地；正如可提出证据加以证明的那样地
论证；论据；争吵；内容提要

trans.tranCn: 可论证的；可议的；可疑的
trans.tranOther: If you say that it is arguable that something is true, you believe that it can be supported by evidence and that many people would agree with it
